extendedInfo.description: Finally! A FREE online voice translator with UNLIMITED usage that supports OFFLINE usage through in-app purchase. * 20+ Languages Within One App - more coming soon! * Free, Unlimited Online Use * In-App Purchase Offline Translators for Travel *Regional Bundles for Multi-Country Trips * Translates Typed or Spoken Input * Great for Language Learning!*Jibbigo is an Interpreter in your pocket. There is no network required for our premium Offline Translators available through in-app purchase.*Free Unlimited Online Use*Offline use requires a one-time in-app purchase.*Advanced Multi-Lingual Speech RecognitionHereâs what people have to say about us:"You can literally have a conversation in a language that you do not know with this. If you have even the slightest need to work with people that speak a language that you donât regularly I would highly recommend this app to anyone." AppShouter.com"In the end? We're impressed. It's a neat app, and it does what it says it'll do in a way that's easily accessible and uncluttered." DVice.comSupported languages & dialects (additional languages coming soon):* English (U.S.)* English (U.K./International)* Spanish (Mexico)* Spanish (Spain)* French* Italian (text only)* German* Chinese (Mandarin)* Japanese* Korean* Thai* Filipino (Tagalog)* Pashto* Arabic* Romanian (text only)* Bulgarian (text only)* Danish (text only)* Hebrew (text only)* Greek (text only)* Portuguese (text only)* Catalan (text only)* Esperanto (text only)* Regional Bundles for Multi-Country TravelFEATURES* Online (free) and offline (premium) capabilities within the same app.* Award-winning speech recognition in a dozen languages* Ability to type or edit text with keypad.* Add-name function for personal and place names, available for offline translators.* Compatible with voice-over accessibility for vision-impaired users.*Please note* this app is not compatible with older versions of Jibbigo. We are working to migrate those customers to this new version. In the mean time, contact customer support with any questions. info@jibbigo.comDevice Specifications:* MinimumMemory: 256 MB CPU: 800 MHz ARM CPUPlatform: 2.2+* RecommendedMemory: 512 MBCPU: 1 GHz ARM CPUPlatform: 4.0+To check your device compatibility, visit: http://www.jibbigo.com/website/support/need-helpTO USE JIBBIGO:1. Select translator language pair and tap âStart Translatorâ2. Hold down the microphone button by the flag of the language you speak.3. The screen will turn red while recording.4. Say a brief phrase (while still holding the microphone button).5. Release the microphone button when done.6. Your phrase will be translated and a written sentence will appear in both the initial and the target language.7. To type or edit a phrase, simply tap the text box and a keyboard will appear.More info at www.jibbigo.com.Questions or concerns? Email us at info@jibbigo.com

reviews.title: Fix crash bug please
reviews.comment: I crashed even before I use it on the time it was just installed in my device. What?
reviews.author: Neville Ayron

reviews.title: Very cool program but...
reviews.comment: Great translator but unless you speak very clearly into the microphone it will get your words messed up. Interesting way also teach yourself a new language. Works great on samsung galaxy tab 2 7 .0
reviews.author: Rc C

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Why amharic isn\'t available? It would be usefull for Ethiopian. And why the arabic flag is the flag of Iraq ??? Maybe you should change it to the Arab League flag !!!???
reviews.author: Serena Gomez

reviews.title: Don\'t work offline
reviews.comment: I purchased the offline language pack but it won\'t open offline. No stars.
reviews.author: john dickens

reviews.comment: Cool

reviews.title: Very good translation, even with my accent
reviews.comment: Often my accent throws of speech recognition software. This one did not miss a single word. Well done!
reviews.author: Bhanu Mullapudi

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: This app is hit or miss. Sometimes the translations are accurate, many times there not
reviews.author: Norm Van Wieren

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Bad
reviews.author: Edi zuck

reviews.title: Way too slow
reviews.comment: I like the idea of having offline translation, but this app is way too slow. It takes well over 10 seconds to translate once sentence.
reviews.author: Dick Hoebee

reviews.title: Offline Language works now.
reviews.comment: Reinstalled and downloaded language pair, and voila it now works offline.  Back to 4 stars.  5 stars when the vocabulary improves so it doesn\'t parse into wrong words.
reviews.author: Larry Underhill

reviews.title: Not gd
reviews.comment: It\'s really bad to have the iraqi arabic instead of the classical arabic that all the arab speaking countries can speak it,also anyone who learns arabic will learn the classical arabic not a specific country accent..uninstall it right away..and it\'s slow also
reviews.author: hiba deek

reviews.title: Very disappointing app
reviews.comment: The voice input translation is practically useless. It seldom gives a correct result interpretating English or chinese.  Typed results are reasonable. I wouldn\'t recomend this app. Unfortunately I paid for it.
reviews.author: Paul Hamilton

reviews.title: Won\'t download language sets
reviews.comment: Paid four 2 language sets and they won\'t download.  Used the company\'s troubleshoot procedures to no avail.    Contacted the company asking for a refund.  Only got an autoresponder email says someone would contact me, never happened.    Don\'t know where to go from here, but I won\'t side on the side lines getting ripped off.    Never again !!!!
reviews.author: Roger R

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: They fixed the problem and now it works on the Samsung Galaxy S3, Android 4.1. It\'s like having a tri-corder to speak Klingon. Just press and speak and it translates through your speaker. Very cool.The best part is that it works offline ($5 version) for countries like Cuba that don\'t have much internet. I\'m going to use it the next time I go to Miami too. Habla Espanol?
reviews.author: Mackey Avelli

reviews.title: Good when it works,  often disappears
reviews.comment: This software translates well.   However,  the offline package which I purchased constantly un installs itself from my phone.   I was in Thailand,  and twice it was gone, and I had to find wifi to re download. This caused big communication problems.   Now I am home,  and lo and behold,  it has been deleted again.  To reinstall you also need to delete jibbigo and reinstall,  or else you can\'t download the offline package.
reviews.author: Chris Zakrzewski

reviews.title: Language Pack not working
reviews.comment: App is great when connected to internet, but the Language pack that I purchased does not work offline.
reviews.author: Eric Kev

reviews.title: Slow and inaccurate
reviews.comment: I was just testing this out with a coworker to see if I should buy the Chinese language pack for an upcoming business trip.  The short of it is the translation was slow and inaccurate.  The voice recognition of this program isn\'t great and it seemed to have trouble with my coworker\'s accent.  I cannot recommend this, though the idea and interface are both nice.
reviews.author: Ben Bowers

reviews.title: Failed to download offline mode
reviews.comment: Trying to reinstall purchased app but fails to recognize that i have already purchased this. Downloading previous language pair fails. Terrible and a waste of money.. worked great in the previous version.
reviews.author: kenneth chung

reviews.title: Worked for a few days.
reviews.comment: I loved this app for about 2 days. Now it crashes every time I open it. I purchased the English/ Chinese package. It is not installed anymore. Waste of money. I hope it is fixed before my trip to Asia...
reviews.author: erin beveridge

reviews.title: Fantastic, except...
reviews.comment: I use this for offline Spanish/English. The actual translations are much more accurate than any other service I\'ve used and the UI is easily the best I\'ve come across. However, loading the app and performing translations takes an ungodly amount of time, making this software useless for on-the-run translation. That problem might be related to the audio part of the software, which I personally have no need for.
reviews.author: Per Abrahamsen
